title: May and the Big Feelings
backCoverBlurb: May has big emotions sometimes. Help him understand happy, sad, angry, and calm feelings in this gentle and supportive story.
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He has an expressive face that shows his emotions clearly. He is wearing a blue and white striped shirt.

pages.text: Sometimes May feels very, very happy. He has a big smile!
pages.imagePrompt: May with curly blonde hair and a huge, joyful smile showing his blue eyes.

pages.text: Being happy feels like sunshine inside your heart.
pages.imagePrompt: May laughing and playing with a bright yellow ball.

pages.text: But sometimes, May feels a little bit sad. It's okay.
pages.imagePrompt: May with a small pout and a soft, thoughtful expression.

pages.text: A big hug from Mommy helps the sadness go away.
pages.imagePrompt: May being hugged by his mommy, looking comforted.

pages.text: One day, May felt a little bit angry. Grrr!
pages.imagePrompt: May with a small scowl, crossing his arms.

pages.text: He took a deep breath. One, two, three. Calm down.
pages.imagePrompt: May closing his eyes and taking a slow, deep breath.

pages.text: Now May feels calm and peaceful again. Ahhh.
pages.imagePrompt: May sitting quietly and looking very relaxed.

pages.text: He also feels excited when he sees a new toy!
pages.imagePrompt: May with wide, 'shocked' eyes and his mouth in an 'O' shape.

pages.text: All feelings are a part of little May's big day.
pages.imagePrompt: A collage showing May with many different expressions.

pages.text: It is good to know how we feel deep inside.
pages.imagePrompt: May pointing to his chest with a gentle smile.

pages.text: May is learning more about his feelings every day.
pages.imagePrompt: May looking at a colorful book of faces.

pages.text: Goodnight, May. Sleep with a happy and calm heart.
pages.imagePrompt: May sleeping peacefully with a slight smile.
